title: Fall in Love with NPC
overview: "Let's fall in love", as a love development game, attracts a large number of players with male god NPCs with unbelievable looks and different personalities. However, with the frequent occurrence of bugs in the "Love it" game, the male god NPC not only violates the settings, but even hurts the players. Fans abandoned the pit, players complained, and the company decided to completely delete all the data of the game. As the founder of the game, Yan Wei couldn't bear to "love it" just disappear, and decided to enter the game in person to find bugsâ€¦
